text: William Negri (; 30 July 1935 - 26 June 2020) was an Italian association football manager and footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He represented the Italy national football team 12 times. He was born in Bagnolo San Vito, Italy. Negri died on 26 June 2020 in Mantua, Italy at the age of 84.William Negri morto, addio al portiere dell'ultimo scudetto del Bologna ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Lombardy Category:Italian association football goalkeepers Category:Italian football managers
title: William Negri
